Class MovingThing

  • java.lang.Object
    • MovingThing
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Locatable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Alien, Ammo, BadAlien, Ship

    public abstract class MovingThing
extends java.lang.Object
implements Locatable
    Interface to describe a moveable object that implements locatable. A moveable object can have a x-coordinate and a y-coordinate. The position and the individual coordinates can be set. The individual coordinates can be returned. The object can have a width and a height which can also be set and returned.
    Author:
    tua3122
